pages.text: Ta-Sin Tilka 'Ayatu Al-Qur'ani Wa Kitabin Mubinin
Al-Ladhina Yuqimuna As-Salaata Wa Yu'utuna Az-Zakaata Wa Hum Bil-'Akhirati Hum Yuqinuna
Inna Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Bil-'Akhirati Zayyanna Lahum 'A`malahum Fahum Ya`mahuna
Ula'ika Al-Ladhina Lahum Su'u Al-`Adhabi Wa Hum Fi Al-'Akhirati Humu Al-'Akhsaruna
Wa 'Innaka Latulaqqa Al-Qur'ana Min Ladun Hakimin `Alimin
Idh Qala Musa Li'hlihi 'Inni 'Anastu Naraan Sa'atikum Minha Bikhabarin 'Aw 'Atikum Bishihabin Qabasin La`allakum Tastaluna
Falamma Ja'aha Nudiya 'An Burika Man Fi An-Nari Wa Man Hawlaha Wa Subhana Allahi Rabbi Al-`Alamina
Wa 'Alqi `Asaka Falamma Ra'aha Tahtazzu Ka'annaha Jannun Walla Mudbiraan Wa Lam Yu`aqqib Ya Musa La Takhaf 'Inni La Yakhafu Ladayya Al-Mursaluna
Illa Man Zalama Thumma Baddala Husnaan Ba`da Su'in Fa'inni Ghafurun Rahimun
Wa 'Adkhil Yadaka Fi Jaybika Takhruj BayÄ‘a'a Min Ghayri Su'in Fi Tis`i 'Ayatin 'Ila Fir`awna Wa Qawmihi 'Innahum Kanu Qawmaan Fasiqina
Falamma Ja'at/hum 'Ayatuna Mubsiratan Qalu Hadha Sihrun Mubinun
